name: Socio-Economic Society for Total Advancement
briefDescription: SOCIO-ECONOMIC SOCIETY FOR TOTAL ADVANCEMENT  is a registered Socio-Cultural Non-Govt. voluntary organization, dedicated to the cause of social justice and socio-economic development of the rural masses in the remote areas of Assam.  The Society has been relentlessly putting in its effort to create an impact on the people to participate in building Rural India as envisaged by the father of the nation, Mahatma Gandhi. SESTA believes in peopleâ€™s participation in its various activities and programs. During the last one year of its existence, it has been making serious efforts for making the rural masses self reliant through income generating activities and lots of programs have been implemented in the remote areas of Assam.
